name: Pirate Bay (itamardag)
description:
Rrrrrr go on an adventure and find treasure that will change your life!

With the help of the Bermuda Triangle map  (not implemented yet) you will choose the next island in the journey  and the crew member who will embark to explore the island and gather resources and treasures.

                                                                                                                          

On the way you will have to defeat anyone who tries to stop you.

In this prototype you will try one of the future classes, and fight using a sword!

Controls:

Left Button - Light Attack

Right Button - Heavy Attack

Left Control - Crouch (currently does nothing)

Left Shift - Slide (currently does nothing (except for sliding))

Space - Jump (pretty useless though
